SEARCH
Package org.trustdeck.ace.service

Klasse PseudonymDBAccessService

java.lang.Object
org.trustdeck.ace.service.PseudonymDBAccessService
@Service public class PseudonymDBAccessService extends Object
This class is used to encapsulate all methods needed to access the database for handling pseudonym-records.

  • Feldübersicht

    Felder
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Feld
    Beschreibung
    static final String
    INSERTION_DUPLICATE_IDENTIFIER
    Represents the duplication status of a requested insertion of an identifier Ungültige Eingabe: "&" idType combination into the database.
    static final String
    INSERTION_DUPLICATE_PSEUDONYM
    Represents the duplication status of a requested insertion of a pseudonym into the database.
    static final String
    INSERTION_ERROR
    Represents an erroneous insertion of a record into the database.
    static final String
    INSERTION_SUCCESS
    Represents a successful insertion of a record into the database.

      public PseudonymDBAccessService()

  • Methodendetails

    • deletePseudonymBatch

      public boolean deletePseudonymBatch(List<Pseudonym> pseudonyms, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to delete multiple pseudonyms at once in a batch. Not found pseudonyms will be ignored.
      Parameter:
      pseudonyms - a list of pseudonyms that are to be deleted from the database
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      true when the batch deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • deletePseudonym

      public boolean deletePseudonym(String domainName, String identifier, String idType, String pseudonym, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Deletes a pseudonym-record from the pseudonym table.
      Parameter:
      domainName - the name of the domain to search in
      identifier - the identifier of the record you want to delete
      idType - the type of the identifier of the record you want to delete
      pseudonym - the pseudonym of the record you want to delete
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      true when the deletion was successful or the record was not in the database, false otherwise

    • exists

      public boolean exists(Pseudonym p)
      Checks whether or not the given pseudonym-record can be found in the DB.
      Parameter:
      p - the pseudonym-record to check the existence of
      Gibt zurück:
      true when the pseudonym-record exists in the DB, false otherwise

    • getRecordFromIdentifier

      public List<Pseudonym> getRecordFromIdentifier(String domainName, String identifier, String idType, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves a pseudonym-record from a specified identifier.
      Parameter:
      domainName - the name of the domain to search in
      identifier - the identifier to search for
      idType - the type of the identifier
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      the pseudonymization data element referring to the given identifier, or null when nothing is found or an error occurs

    • getRecordFromPseudonym

      public Pseudonym getRecordFromPseudonym(String domainName, String psn, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Retrieves a pseudonym-record from a specified pseudonym.
      Parameter:
      domainName - the name of the domain to search in
      psn - the pseudonym to search for
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      the pseudonymization data element referring to the given pseudonym, or null when nothing is found or an error occurs

    • getRecord

      public List<Pseudonym> getRecord(String domainName, String identifier, String idType, String psn, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to retrieve pseudonym-records. This method actually only evaluates the given information and delegates the getting-process.
      Parameter:
      domainName - the name of the domain to search in
      identifier - the identifier to search for
      idType - the type of the identifier
      psn - the pseudonym to search for
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      the pseudonymization data element referring to the given information, or null when nothing is found or an error occurs

    • insertPseudonymBatch

      public String insertPseudonymBatch(List<Pseudonym> pseudonyms, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to insert multiple pseudonyms at once in a batch. Duplicates will be ignored.
      Parameter:
      pseudonyms - a list of pseudonyms to insert into the database
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      INSERTION_SUCCESS when the batch insertion was successful, INSERTION_ERROR otherwise

    • insertPseudonym

      public String insertPseudonym(Pseudonym pseudonym, boolean multiplePsnAllowed, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to insert a pseudonym into the database.
      Parameter:
      pseudonym - the pseudonym object that should be inserted
      multiplePsnAllowed - whether or not multiple pseudonyms per idUngültige Eingabe: "&idType" combination are allowed
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      INSERTION_SUCCESS when the insertion was successful, INSERTION_DUPLICATE when the record was already in the database, INSERTION_ERROR otherwise

    • updatePseudonymBatch

      public boolean updatePseudonymBatch(List<Pseudonym> pseudonyms, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to update multiple pseudonyms at once in a batch. Not found pseudonyms will be ignored. Updatable attributes are restricted to pseudonym, validFrom, validFromInherited, validTo, and validToInherited.
      Parameter:
      pseudonyms - a list of pseudonyms that are to be updated in the database
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      true when the batch update was successful, false otherwise

    • updatePseudonym

      public boolean updatePseudonym(Pseudonym oldRecord, Pseudonym newRecord, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Method to update pseudonym-records in the database. Updates only those parameters that aren't null.
      Parameter:
      oldRecord - the record object of the record that should be updated
      newRecord - the new record object containing the data that should be updated
      request - the request object that is needed for creating the audit database-entries. If no auditing should be performed, you can pass null.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the update was successful and only one record was affected, false otherwise.
